text: Bennett Run is a tributary of the Beaver River in western Pennsylvania. The stream rises in north-central Beaver County then flows southwest entering the Beaver River at Morado, Pennsylvania. The watershed is roughly 25% agricultural, 53% forested and the rest is other uses. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Beaver River Category:Rivers of Beaver County, Pennsylvania
title: Bennett Run (Beaver River tributary)
